dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5385 EH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 55 Grasso Plaza in St. Louis, Missouri, as the “Sgt. Amanda N. Pinson Post Office”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 55 Grasso Plaza in St. Louis, Missouri, as the Sgt. Amanda N. Pinson Post Office.

section.header: Sgt. Amanda N. Pinson Post Office

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 55 Grasso Plaza in St. Louis, Missouri, shall be known and designated as the Sgt. Amanda N. Pinson Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Sgt. Amanda N. Pinson Post Office.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives December 8, 2014.
